ygData.subject: Using heritrix 3.0 rest API to create or launch Job (Java Program)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi All, I am new to heritrix 3.x and using rest API in java. I am trying to create java program, which uses heritrix rest APIs and do job creation or launches

Hi All,

I am new to heritrix 3.x and using rest API in java. I am trying t=
o create java program, which uses heritrix rest APIs and do job creation or=
 launches job.

I am following this heritrix 3.x API guide document.
https:=
//webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.x+API+Guide

one give me sample program or point me to sample program about how to use h=
eritrix rest APIs to do this.

Thank You
